Name: 6x2EX ERR_a06 [Pub Edition]
Description:
EnemiesNoSync Edition, For Pubbing. Breaking the Limit in 6x2EX. What is Elite Restriction Release? 90% of enemies have a chance to spawn in Elite variant, Elite enemies stats are tuned significantly, for Balance. New Elite variants are also borns with new quirks to ensure the enjoyment of the difficulty.
    Alpha 06
  - Oppressor limit count: Now also adding Elite Oppressor into the Limit Count (Normal circumstance: 3). During Defense, Limit Count is now reduced to 1 Oppressor (Normal/Elite).
  - Elite Menace: Has original Elite Menace health -> Oppressor's Health. Its weakpoint HP 100 -> 130.
  - Swarmer: DifficultyRating 4 -> 2. MaxSpawnCount 180 -> 300.
